00031     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Vector {
00032 
00033         public:
00034 
00035         //----------  management  ----------
00036 
00037         Vector<D, N> () { }
00038         Vector<D, N> (N, ... );
00039 
00040         //----------  access      ----------
00041 
00042         N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00043         N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00044 
00045         static unsigned dimension (void);
00046 
00047         //----------  arithmetics ----------
00048 
00049         Vector<D, N> &operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00050         Vector<D, N> &operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00051         Vector<D, N> &operator*= (const N &s);
00052 
00053         Vector<D, N> operator- (void) const;
00054         Vector<D, N> operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00055         Vector<D, N> operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y);
00056         Vector<D, N> operator* (const N &s);
00057         N operator* (const Vector<D, N> &X) const;
00058         Vector<D, N> operator/ (const N &s);
00059 
00060         N sqnorm (void) const;
00061 
00062         N *data () { return x; }
00063

00065         N x[D];
00066     };

00078     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00079             Vector<D, N>::Vector (N x0, ... ) :
00080             x () {
00081         x[0] = x0;
00082         unsigned i = 0;
00083         va_list argp;
00084         va_start (argp, x0);
00085         for (i = 1; i < D; i++) {
00086             x[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00087         }
00088         va_end (argp);
00089     }
00090 
00091     //----------  access      ----------

00096     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00097             N &Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00098         assert(i < D);
00099         return x[i];
00100     }
00101 
00105     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00106             N Vector<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00107         assert(i < D);
00108         return x[i];
00109     }

00112     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00113             unsigned Vector<D, N>::dimension (void) {
00114         return D;
00115     }

00121     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00122             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator+= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00123     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] += Y.x[i];
00124     return *this;
00125     }
00126 
00129     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00130             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator-= (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00131     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] -= Y.x[i];
00132     return *this;
00133     }
00134 
00137     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00138             Vector<D, N> &Vector<D, N>::operator*= (const N &s) {
00139     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) x[i] *= s;
00140     return *this;
00141     }

00144     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00145             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (void) const {
00146         static Vector<D, N> Z;
00147         Z = *this;
00148         for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++) Z.x[i] = -x[i] ;
00149         return Z;
00150     }
00151 
00154     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00155             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator+ (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00156     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00157     Z = *this;
00158     return (Z += Y);
00159     }
00160 
00163     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00164             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator- (const Vector<D, N> &Y) {
00165     static Vector<D, N> Z;
00166     Z = *this;
00167     return (Z -= Y);
00168     }

00172     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00173             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator* (const N &s) {
00174     Vector <D, N>Z;
00175     Z = *this;
00176     return Z *= s;
00177     }
00178 
00182     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00183             N Vector<D, N>::operator* (const Vector<D, N> &Y) const {
00184     N dot = 0.;
00185     for (unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++)
00186         if (x[i]) dot += x[i]*Y.x[i];
00187 
00188     return dot;
00189     }
00190 
00193     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00194             Vector<D, N> Vector<D, N>::operator/ (const N &s) {
00195     return operator* (1./s);
00196     }
00197 
00199     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00200             N Vector<D, N>::sqnorm (void) const {
00201     return operator* (*this);
00202     }

00211     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00212             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Vector<D, N> &v) {
00213         //  i might want to use other brackets one day
00214         o << "<";
00215         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < v.dimension ()-1; i++ )
00216         o << v[i] << ",";
00217         o << v[v.dimension ()-1] << ">";
00218         return o;
00219     }

00226     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00227             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);
00228 
00235     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00236             Vector<D> cross (const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &, const Vector<D> &);
00237 
00242     template <typename N>
00243             Vector<3, N> vcross (Vector<3, N> a, Vector<3, N> b) {
00244         static Vector<3, N> c;
00245 
00246         c[0] = a[1]*b[2]-a[2]*b[1];
00247         c[1] = a[2]*b[0]-a[0]*b[2];
00248         c[2] = a[0]*b[1]-a[1]*b[0];
00249 
00250         return c;
00251     }
00252 
00258     template <typename N>
00259             Vector<4, N> vcross (Vector<4, N> a, Vector<4, N> b, Vector<4, N> c) {
00260         static Vector<4, N> d;
00261         N A = b[0]*c[1]-b[1]*c[0],
00262         B = b[0]*c[2]-b[2]*c[0],
00263         C = b[0]*c[3]-b[3]*c[0],
00264         D = b[1]*c[2]-b[2]*c[1],
00265         E = b[1]*c[3]-b[3]*c[1],
00266         F = b[2]*c[3]-b[3]*c[2];
00267 
00268         d[0] =  a[1]*F - a[2]*E + a[3]*D;
00269         d[1] = -a[0]*F + a[2]*C - a[3]*B;
00270         d[2] =  a[0]*E - a[1]*C + a[3]*A;
00271         d[3] = -a[0]*D + a[1]*B - a[2]*A;
00272 
00273         return d;
00274     }
00275 
00279     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00280             Vector<D, N> vnormalize( const Vector<D, N> &x ) {
00281         static Vector<D, N> n;
00282         N norm = sqrt ( x.sqnorm() );
00283         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < D; i++ ) n[i] = x[i]/norm;
00284         return n;
00285     }
00286 }
